zh: 信驊科技發布最新公司網站

位於新竹科學園區的信驊科技，這家高度創新的fabless Soc –centric IC設計公司於2010年12月發布了最新的公司網頁。經由六個月緊鑼密鼓整合公司廣泛的資訊後，現在您可以在信驊科技最新的網頁裡使用繁體中文與英文來瀏覽多樣化的產品資訊。信驊科技總經理林鴻明先生說：「我們希望創造一個簡單明瞭且令人耳目一新的新網站。」「它能幫助我們聯繫世界各地的客戶，使其了解公司產品且容易與我們聯絡及互動，提供客戶一個使用方便的平台正是這個網站的關鍵所在。」
簡易的瀏覽頁面、新穎的內容與產品影音，以及改良後的搜尋引擎是新網站最大的特色。
關於 ASPEED信驊科技股份有限公司“信驊科技”成立於2004年11月，為一家高度創新的fabless半導體公司。致力於提供先進的SOC中央運算產品，包含矽晶片、IP以及相關軟體產品，此產品之應用目標為多媒體、影像與網路功能。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站 http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
媒體聯絡方式：吳俐俐行銷暨業務部資深行銷專員連絡電話：886-955-988-421Lili_wu@aspeedtech.com
en: ASPEED Technology Launch New Corporate Website

Hsinchu, Taiwan, December, 2010 - ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless SoC-centric IC design house has launched an all-new version of their corporate website.  The new website is now available in English and Traditional Chinese is a result of over 6 months intensive work to incorporates a breadth and versatility of the ASPEED product portfolio.

"We wanted to create an easy to navigate, delightful visual impact with the new site," said Chris Lin, President of ASPEED Technology Inc. "The site is a key tool for us to reach our customers worldwide, to provide a user-friendly environment to learn about our products and to easily communicate and interact with us”
The newly launched websites feature ease of navigation, new content and product videos and improved search engine optimization.

About ASPEED Technology Inc.ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless company founded in Nov. 2004, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, devotes itself to providing silicon chips, silicon IPs and software products that enable sophisticated SOC-centric multimedia, graphics and network applications. For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
